translation.en: [Mike] Something is coming. Something hungry for blood.
translation.de: Etwas nähert sich. Etwas, das nach Blut dürstet.

translation.en: A shadow grows on the wall behind you, swallowing you in darkness.
translation.de: Ein plötzlicher Schatten an der Wand, der dich in Dunkelheit hüllt.

translation.en: -It is almost here. -What is it?
translation.de: -Es ist fast da. -Was ist es denn?

translation.en: What if it's the Demogorgon?
Oh, Jesus, we're so screwed if it's the Demogorgon.
translation.de: Meine Fresse, wenn es der Demogorgon ist, sind wir erledigt.

translation.en: It's not the Demogorgon.
An army of troglodytes charge into the chamber!
translation.de: Eine Armee Troglodyten stürmt in die Kammer!

translation.en: -Troglodytes? -Told ya. [chuckling]
[softly] Wait a minute.
Did you hear that?
That... that sound?
That didn't come from the troglodytes. No, that... That came from something else.
translation.de: Das waren keine Troglodyten. Nein, das war etwas anderes.

translation.en: -The Demogorgon! -[all groaning]
-We're in deep shit. -Will, your action!
-I don't know! -Fireball him!
I'd have to roll a 13 or higher! Too risky. Cast a protection spell.
translation.de: -Ich brauche 13 oder mehr! -Zu riskant. Dann ein Schutzzauber.

translation.en: -Don't be a pussy. Fireball him! -Cast Protection.
The Demogorgon is tired of your silly human bickering!
translation.de: Der Demogorgon hat das blöde Menschengezanke satt!

translation.en: It stomps towards you. -Boom! -Fireball him!
-Another stomp, boom! -Cast Protection.
-He roars in anger! -[all clamoring]
-Fireball! -[die clattering]
-Oh, shit! -[Lucas] Where'd it go?
[Lucas] Where is it? [Will] I don't know!
-Is it a 13? -[Will] I don't know!
[Lucas] Where is it? [Dustin] Oh, my God!
[Karen] Mike! [Dustin] Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
[Karen] Mike! [Lucas] Can you find it yet?
[Will] No, I can't find it!
Mom, we're in the middle of a campaign!
translation.de: Mom, wir sind mitten im Spiel!

translation.en: You mean the end? Fifteen after.
translation.de: Meinst du am Ende? Es ist viertel nach.

translation.en: [Lucas] Oh, my God! Freaking idiot! [Will] Why do we have to go?
-Mom, wait, just 20 more minutes! -It's a school night, Michael.
I just put Holly to bed. You can finish next weekend.
translation.de: Holly schläft schon. Spielt am Wochenende weiter.

translation.en: -But that'll ruin the flow! -Michael--
I'm serious, Mom. The campaign took two weeks to plan.
translation.de: Wirklich, Mom. Der Spielaufbau dauerte zwei Wochen.

translation.en: How was I supposed to know it was gonna take ten hours?
You've been playing for ten hours?
-Dad, don't you think that 20 more-- -I think you should listen to your mother.
-[static crackling on TV] -[grunts] Dang dumb piece of junk.
[Will] Oh, I got it!
-Does the seven count? -It was a seven?
Did Mike see it? Then it doesn't count.
translation.de: Hat Mike es gesehen? Dann zählt es nicht.

translation.en: [Dustin] Yo, hey, guys.
-Does anyone want this? -[both] No.
Yeah, he's cute.
Barb, no, I don't think so.
-Barb, you're not-- -Hey, Nancy.
There's a slice left if you want it.
translation.de: Du kannst gerne ein Stück haben.

translation.en: -Sausage and pepperoni! -Hold on.
-There's something wrong with your sister. -What are you talking about?
translation.de: -Mit deiner Schwester stimmt was nicht. -Was meinst du?

translation.en: -She's got a stick up her butt. -[Lucas] Yeah.
It's because she's been dating that douchebag, Steve Harrington.
translation.de: Weil sie diesen Deppen Steve Harrington datet.

translation.en: [Dustin] Yeah, she's turning into a real jerk. She's always been a real jerk.
translation.de: -Ja, sie wird echt arschig. -Das war sie schon immer.

translation.en: Nuh-uh, she used to be cool.
Like that time she dressed up as an elf for our Elder tree campaign.
translation.de: Als sie eine Elfe für unsere Elder-Baumkampagne war.

translation.en: [Mike] Four years ago!
[Dustin] Just saying. [Lucas] Later.
-It was a seven. -Huh?
The roll, it was a seven.
translation.de: Der Würfel, es war eine Sieben.

translation.en: The Demogorgon, it got me.
[grunts] See you tomorrow.
[Lucas] Good night, ladies. [Dustin] Kiss your mom 'night for me.
translation.de: -Gute Nacht, Mädels. -Gib deiner Mom ein Küsschen von mir.

translation.en: Race you back to my place? Winner gets a comic.
translation.de: Wer zuerst bei mir ist, gewinnt einen Comic.

translation.en: -Any comic? -Yeah.
I didn't say "go"!
Get back here!
I'm gonna kill you!
[Will] I'll take your X-Men 134!
Son of a bitch.
-Jonathan? Mom? -[barking continues]
[woman on TV] And that's it for News Center this morning.
translation.de: Und das war's vom News Center heute Morgen.

translation.en: Thanks for joining us.
Let's hand off now to Liz at the news desk.
translation.de: Weiter mit Liz und den Nachrichten.

translation.en: [Liz] All right, thank you, Donna. Turning now to local news,
translation.de: Ok, danke, Donna. Zu den Lokalnachrichten:

translation.en: we're getting reports of surges and power outages all across the county.
translation.de: Im ganzen Land wurden Stromschwankungen und -ausfälle gemeldet.

translation.en: Last night, hundreds of homes in East Hawkins were affected,
translation.de: Gestern waren Hunderte Haushalte in East Hawkins betroffen,

translation.en: leaving many residents in the dark.
The cause of the outage is still unknown.
We reached out to Roane County Water and Electric,
translation.de: Ein Sprecher der Stadtwerke von Roane County versicherte uns,

translation.en: and a spokesperson says that they are confident
translation.de: Ein Sprecher der Stadtwerke von Roane County versicherte uns, die Stromversorgung werde in wenigen Stunden

translation.en: power will be restored to all remaining homes
translation.de: die Stromversorgung werde in wenigen Stunden

translation.en: within the next several hours.
In other news, you might wanna stay home tonight
translation.de: Gehen Sie heute besser nicht raus,

translation.en: or at least pack an umbrella.
We turn to everybody's favorite morning weather guy, Charles.
translation.de: Jetzt kommt unser aller Lieblingswettermann Charles.

translation.en: [Joyce] Where the hell are they?
-Jonathan? -Check the couch!
Ugh, I did.
Oh... Got them.
Okay, sweetie, I will see you tonight.
translation.de: Ok, Süßer, wir sehen uns heute Abend.

translation.en: -Yeah, see you later. -Where's Will?
Oh, I didn't get him up yet. -He's probably still sleeping. -[sighs]
translation.de: Ich hab ihn nicht geweckt. Er schläft wohl noch.

translation.en: -Jonathan, you have to make sure he's up! -Mom, I'm making breakfast.
translation.de: -Jonathan, du musst ihn wecken! -Mom, ich mache Frühstück.

translation.en: I told you this a thousand times.
Will! Come on, honey. It's time to get up.
-He came home last night, right? -He's not in his room?
translation.de: -Er war letzte Nacht aber da, oder? -Ist er nicht in seinem Zimmer?

translation.en: -Did he come home or not? -I don't know.
-You don't know? -No.
[stammering] I got home late. I was working. You were working?
translation.de: -Ich kam spät von der Arbeit heim. -Du hast gearbeitet?

translation.en: Eric asked if I could cover. I said yeah.
I just thought we could use the extra cash.
-Jonathan, we've talked about this. -I know, I know.
You can't take shifts when I'm working.
Mom, it's not a big deal. Look, he was at the Wheelers' all day.
translation.de: Mach kein Fass auf. Er war den ganzen Tag bei den Wheelers.

translation.en: -I'm sure he just stayed over. -[sighs] I can't believe you.
I can't believe you sometimes.
-[phone ringing] -That's disgusting.
-[Mike] You're disgusting! -Hello?
Hi, Karen. It's Joyce.
-[Karen] Oh, Joyce, hi. -What the hell, Mike?
-[Ted] Hey! -Quiet!
-Language. -Are you kidding?
Was that Will I heard back there?
Will? No, no, no, it's just Mike.
Will didn't spend the night?
[Karen] No, he left here a little bit after 8:00.
translation.de: Nein, er ist kurz nach acht gegangen.

translation.en: Why? He's not home?
translation.de: Warum? Ist er nicht zu Hause?

translation.en: Um, you know what? I think he just left early for... for school.
translation.de: Weißt du was? Sicher fuhr er früher zur Schule.

translation.en: -Thank you so much. Bye. -Okay. Bye.
That's weird. I don't see him.
translation.de: Das ist komisch. Ich sehe ihn nicht.

translation.en: [Lucas] I'm telling you, his mom's right. He probably just went to class early again.
translation.de: Seine Mom hatte sicher recht. Er fuhr wohl früher zur Schule.

translation.en: Yeah, he's always paranoid Gursky's gonna give him another pop quiz.
translation.de: Er hat voll Schiss vor noch einem Test von Gursky.

translation.en: Step right up, ladies and gentlemen.
Step right up and get your tickets for the freak show.
translation.de: Holen Sie sich Ihre Tickets für die Freak-Show.

translation.en: Who do you think would make more money in a freak show?
translation.de: Wer würde wohl mehr Kohle in einer Freak-Show machen?

translation.en: Midnight, Frogface, or Toothless?
[mimicking Dustin] I'd go with Toothless.
I told you a million times, my teeth are coming in.
translation.de: Ich hab schon zig Mal gesagt, dass meine Zähne verwachsen sind.

translation.en: It's called cleidocranial dysplasia.
[mimicking Dustin] "I told you a million times."
-[chuckles] -Do the arm thing.
Do it, freak!
[Troy] God, it gets me every time.
-Assholes. -[Mike] I think it's kinda cool.
It's like you have superpowers or something.
translation.de: Als ob du Superkräfte oder so was hast.

translation.en: Like Mr. Fantastic.
[Dustin] Yeah, except I can't fight evil with it.
translation.de: Bloß kann ich damit nicht das Böse besiegen.

translation.en: [Barbara] So, did he call?
Keep your voice down.
Did he?
I told you, it's not like that.
Okay, I mean, yes, he likes me, but not like that.
translation.de: Ok, ja, klar mag er mich, aber nicht so.

translation.en: We just...
made out a couple times.
"We just... made out a couple times."
translation.de: "Wir haben nur ein paar Mal geknutscht."

translation.en: Nance, seriously, you're gonna be so cool now, it's ridiculous.
translation.de: Nance, im Ernst, du gehörst bald zu den Obercoolen.

translation.en: No, I'm not.
You better still hang out with me, that's all I'm saying.
translation.de: Bleib ja weiter meine Freundin. Mehr sage ich nicht dazu.

translation.en: If you become friends with Tommy H. or Carol--
translation.de: Wenn du dich mit Tommy H. oder Carol anfreundest...

translation.en: Oh, that's gross!
Okay, I'm telling you, it was a one-time...
translation.de: Ok, ich sage doch, es war eine einmalige...

translation.en: -Two-time thing. -[chuckles]
You were saying?
-I have to go. -In a minute.
Steve. I really, like... Seriously, I have to go.
translation.de: Steve. Ich muss wirklich... Ich muss wirklich los.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. Let's...
Come on, let's do something tonight, yeah?
translation.de: Lass uns heute Abend was machen, ok?

translation.en: Uh... No, I can't. I have to study for Kaminsky's test.
translation.de: Nein. Ich muss für Kaminskys Test lernen.

translation.en: Oh, come on. What's your GPA again? 3.999...
translation.de: Komm schon. Wie ist dein Durchschnitt? 1,111...

translation.en: Kaminsky's tests are impossible.
-Well, then, just let me help. -You failed chem.
-C-minus. -Well, in that case...
So I'll be over around, say, like, 8:00?
translation.de: Dann komme ich gegen acht, ok?

translation.en: -Are you crazy? My mom would not-- -I'll climb through your window.
translation.de: -Bist du verrückt? Meine Mom... -Ich klettere durchs Fenster.

translation.en: She won't even know I'm there. I'm stealthy, like a ninja.
translation.de: Sie merkt es nicht. Ich bin flink wie ein Ninja.

translation.en: You are crazy.
Wait, wait, wait. Just... Okay, forget about that. We can just...
translation.de: Warte. Ok, vergiss das. Wir können einfach nur...

translation.en: We can just, like, chill in my car.
translation.de: Wir können uns in mein Auto setzen.

translation.en: We can find a nice quiet place to park, and...
translation.de: Wir suchen einen netten ruhigen Parkplatz und...

translation.en: Steve... I have to study. I'm not kidding.
translation.de: Steve... Ich muss lernen. Das ist mein Ernst.

translation.en: Well, why do you think I want it to be nice and quiet?
translation.de: Darum will ich doch, dass wir ungestört sind.

translation.en: You're an idiot, Steve Harrington.
translation.de: Du bist so ein Idiot, Steve Harrington.

translation.en: Meet me at Dearborn and Maple at 8:00.
translation.de: Um 20 Uhr an der Ecke Deaborn und Marple.

translation.en: To study.
Good of you to show.
[Hopper slurring] Oh, hey, morning, Flo. Morning, everybody.
-Hey, Chief. -Damn! You look like hell, Chief.
translation.de: -Hey, Chief. -Verdammt! Sie sehen übel aus, Chief.

translation.en: -Oh, yeah? -[chuckles] Yeah.
Well, I looked better than your wife when I left her this morning.
translation.de: Besser als Ihre Frau, als ich heute Morgen ging.

translation.en: While you were drinking or sleeping, or whatever it is you deemed so necessary on Monday morning,
translation.de: Während Sie heute Morgen tranken, schliefen oder sonst was getan haben,

translation.en: Phil Larson called. Said some kids are stealing the gnomes out of his garden again.
translation.de: rief Phil Larson an. Er sagte, Kinder klauen Zwerge aus seinem Garten.

translation.en: Oh, those garden gnomes again. Well, I'll tell you what, I'm gonna get right on that.
translation.de: Schon wieder diese Gartenzwerge. Ich kümmere mich sofort darum.

translation.en: On a more pressing matter,
Joyce Byers can't find her son this morning.
translation.de: Joyce Byers kann ihren Sohn heute Morgen nicht finden.

translation.en: [muffled] Mmm. Okay, I'm gonna get on that.
translation.de: Joyce Byers kann ihren Sohn heute Morgen nicht finden. Ok, ich kümmere mich darum.

translation.en: -Just give me a minute. -Joyce is very upset.
Well, Flo, Flo, we've discussed this. Mornings are for coffee and contemplation.
translation.de: Flo, wir haben das doch besprochen. Morgens nur Kaffee und nachdenken.

translation.en: -Chief, she's already in your-- -Coffee and contemplation, Flo!
translation.de: -Chief, sie ist schon in Ihrem... -Kaffee und nachdenken, Flo!

translation.en: I have been waiting here over an hour, Hopper.
translation.de: Ich warte seit einer Stunde, Hopper.

translation.en: [sighs deeply] And I apologize again.
translation.de: Und ich entschuldige mich noch mal.

translation.en: I'm going out of my mind!
Look, boy his age, he's probably just playing hookie, okay?
translation.de: Pass auf, ein Junge in seinem Alter, bestimmt schwänzt er nur, ok?

translation.en: No, not my Will. He's not like that. -He wouldn't do that. -Well, you never know.
translation.de: -Nein, nicht Will. Das würde er nie tun. -Weiß man nie.

translation.en: I mean, my mom thought I was on the debate team,
translation.de: Mom dachte, ich wäre im Debattierclub,

translation.en: when really I was just screwing Chrissy Carpenter in the back of my dad's Oldsmobile, so...
translation.de: und ich vögelte Chrissy Carpenter in Dads Oldsmobile.

translation.en: Look, he's not like you, Hopper. He's not like me.
translation.de: Er ist nicht wie du, Hopper. Er ist nicht wie ich.

translation.en: He's not like... most.
translation.de: Er ist nicht wie... die meisten.

translation.en: He has a couple of friends, but, you know, the kids, they're mean.
translation.de: Er hat ein paar Freunde, aber die Kinder sind fies.

translation.en: They make fun of him. They call him names.
translation.de: Sie machen sich über ihn lustig.

translation.en: -They laugh at him, his clothes-- -His clothes?
-What's wrong with his clothes? -I don't know.
-Does that matter? -Maybe.
Look, he's... He's a sensitive kid.
translation.de: Hör zu, er ist... Er ist ein sensibler Junge.

translation.en: Lonnie... [sighs] Lonnie used to say he was queer.
translation.de: Lonnie... Lonnie bezeichnete ihn als schwul.

translation.en: [softy] Called him a fag.
-Is he? -He's missing is what he is.
When was the last time you heard from Lonnie?
translation.de: Wann hörtest du das letzte Mal von Lonnie?

translation.en: Uh, last I heard, he was in Indianapolis. That was about a year ago.
translation.de: Das letzte Mal aus Indianapolis. Das ist etwa ein Jahr her.

translation.en: -But he has nothing to do with this. -Why don't you give me his number?
translation.de: -Er hat nichts damit zu tun. -Gib mir mal seine Nummer.

translation.en: You know, Hopper, he has nothing to do with this. Trust me.
translation.de: Er hat nichts damit zu tun. Glaub mir.

translation.en: Joyce, 99 out of 100 times, kid goes missing,
translation.de: Joyce, in 99 von 100 Fällen ist ein vermisstes Kind

translation.en: the kid is with a parent or relative.
[stammers] What about the other time?
-What? -You said, "99 out of 100."
-What about the other time, the one? -Joyce.
translation.de: -Was ist mit dem einen anderen Mal? -Joyce.

translation.en: The one!
-Joyce, this is Hawkins, okay? -[sighs]
translation.de: Joyce, wir sind in Hawkins, ok?

translation.en: You wanna know the worst thing that's ever happened here in the four years I've been working here? Do you wanna know the worst thing?
translation.de: Was war der schlimmste Vorfall in den vier Jahren, die ich hier arbeite?

translation.en: It was when an owl attacked Eleanor Gillespie's head
translation.de: Eine Eule attackierte Eleanor Gillespies Kopf,

translation.en: because it thought that her hair was a nest.
translation.de: weil sie ihr Haar für ein Nest hielt.

translation.en: Okay, fine. I will call Lonnie.
translation.de: Ok, na gut. Ich rufe Lonnie an.

translation.en: He will talk to me before he talks to--
translation.de: Er redet mit mir, ehe er mit einem...

translation.en: -What, a pig? -A cop!
[voice breaking] Just find my son, Hop.
Find him!
[man] Dr. Brenner.
[scientist] This way, gentlemen.
The entire east wing will be evacuated within the hour.
translation.de: Der gesamte Ostflügel wird in einer Stunde evakuiert.

translation.en: We've sealed off this area following quarantine protocol.
translation.de: Wir haben das Gebiet gemäß Quarantäne-Protokoll abgeriegelt.

translation.en: [man 1] This is where it came from? [man 2] Yes.
[man 1] And the girl?
She can't have gone far.
translation.de: Sie kann nicht weit weg sein.

translation.en: [Ben] All right, and one more.
[man] Hey, Ben. What do you think about that, uh... Hey, I don't know. I don't know.
translation.de: -Ben, was hältst du davon? -Hey, keine Ahnung.

translation.en: [man] I don't know, 37 points per game average--
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, 37 Punkte Pro Spiel...

translation.en: [Ben] Thirty-seven now, but... [man] Mr. Basket.
Come here!
Hey, come here!
You think you can steal from me, boy?
What in the hell?
-[bell ringing] -[Mr. Clarke] Remember, finish chapter 12
translation.de: Nicht vergessen: Kapitel 12 durcharbeiten und Frage 12.3 beantworten,

translation.en: and answer 12.3 on the difference between an experiment
translation.de: Nicht vergessen: Kapitel 12 durcharbeiten und Frage 12.3 beantworten, zum Unterschied zwischen einem Experiment und anderen wissenschaftlichen Methoden.

translation.en: and other forms of science investigation.
translation.de: zum Unterschied zwischen einem Experiment und anderen wissenschaftlichen Methoden.

translation.en: This will be on the test, which will cover chapters 10 through 12.
translation.de: Das kommt im Test vor, alle Kapitel von zehn bis 12.

translation.en: [trailing off] It will be multiple choice with an essay section.
translation.de: Multiple Choice und ein kleiner Aufsatz.

translation.en: So, did it come?
Sorry, boys. I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but...
translation.de: Tut mir leid, Jungs. Ich hasse schlechte Nachrichten, aber...

translation.en: it came.
The Heathkit ham shack. [Mike] Whoa. [Mr. Clarke] Ain't she a beaut?
I bet you can talk to New York on this thing.
translation.de: Das reicht sicher bis nach New York.

translation.en: Think bigger.
-California? -Bigger.
Australia?
-[boys exclaiming] -[Lucas] Oh, man!
When Will sees this, he's totally gonna blow his shit.
translation.de: Wenn Will das sieht, freut er sich über beide Arschbacken.

translation.en: -Sorry. -[Dustin chuckles]
[in Australian accent] Hello, this is Mike Wheeler, president of Hawkins Middle AV Club.
translation.de: Hallo, hier Mike Wheeler, Präsident vom Hawkins-Middle-AV-Club.

translation.en: [Lucas] What are you doing?
[in Australian accent] Hello, this is Dustin,
and this is the secretary and treasurer of Hawkins Middle AV Club.
Do you eat kangaroos for breakfast?
Sorry to interrupt, but, uh, may I borrow Michael, Lucas and Dustin?
translation.de: Entschuldigt die Störung, aber dürfte ich Michael, Lucas und Dustin entführen?

translation.en: One at a time, all right? You.
translation.de: Einer nach dem anderen, ok? Du.

translation.en: -You said he takes what? -Mirkwood.
-Mirkwood? -Yeah.
-Have you ever heard of Mirkwood? -I have not. That sounds made up to me.
translation.de: -Je von Düsterwald gehört? -Nein. Klingt irgendwie erfunden.

translation.en: No, it's from Lord of the Rings.
translation.de: Das ist aus Herr der Ringe.

translation.en: -Well, The Hobbit. -It doesn't matter.
-He asked! -[mockingly] "He asked!"
-[Mike] Shut up, guys! -Hey, hey, hey!
-What'd I just say? -Shut up.
One at a damn time. You.
Mirkwood, it's a real road. It's just the name that's made up.
translation.de: Düsterwald ist eine echte Straße. Nur der Name ist erfunden.

translation.en: It's where Cornwallis and Kerley meet.
-Yeah, all right, I think I know that-- -We can show you, if you want.
translation.de: -Die kenne ich... -Wir zeigen es Ihnen gerne.

translation.en: I said that I know it!
-We can help look. -Yeah.
No. After school, you are all to go home. Immediately.
translation.de: Nein. Ihr geht nach der Schule nach Hause. Umgehend.

translation.en: That means no biking around looking for your friend, no investigating,
translation.de: Also kein Rumfahren und Suchen mit dem Rad, keine Nachforschungen,

translation.en: no nonsense.
This isn't some Lord of the Rings book.
-The Hobbit. -Shut up!
-Hey! -[Mike] Stop it!
[softly] Do I make myself clear?
Do I make myself... clear?
[Mike and Dustin] Yes, sir. [Lucas] Yeah.
Anybody home?
[Will] Password?
Uh, Rada...
[stammering] Radaga-- Radagast?
[Will] Yeah. You may enter.
[Joyce] Thank you, sir.
So, guess what?
I got off early and...
Ta-da! Poltergeist.
I... I thought I wasn't allowed to see it. I changed my mind.
translation.de: -Ich denke, den darf ich nicht sehen. -Ich hab's mir überlegt.

translation.en: As long as you don't have nightmares for a week.
No, I won't. I don't get scared like that anymore.
translation.de: Nein. Ich hab keine Angst mehr.

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
Not even of clowns?
No.
What about my witch?
-No. Mom... -Ooh...
-I'm not five anymore. -But Will Byers...
-I'm going to cook you up in my-- -Stop. That's so stupid. Mom!
[Jonathan] Will?
Where are you?
Geez.
Your parents forget to feed you?
translation.de: Gab's bei deinen Eltern nichts zu essen?

translation.en: Is that why you ran away?
They, uh... They hurt you?
translation.de: Haben sie... Haben sie dir wehgetan?

translation.en: You went to the hospital, you got scared, you ran off, you wound up here, is that it?
translation.de: Du warst im Krankenhaus, bekamst Angst, bist weg und hier gelandet?

translation.en: All right.
I'll give this back, all right? And you can have as much as you want.
translation.de: Ich gebe es dir zurück, ok? Du darfst so viel haben, wie du magst.

translation.en: All right? Maybe even some ice cream.
But you gotta answer a few of my questions first, all right?
translation.de: Aber zuerst musst du mir antworten.

translation.en: We got a deal?
All right, let's start with the easy stuff. All right?
translation.de: Ok, wir fangen mit leichten Sachen an.

translation.en: My name's Benny. Benny Hammond.
translation.de: Mein Name ist Benny. Benny Hammond.

translation.en: See? Like this. Here.
I got you. Don't worry. It's okay.
translation.de: Alles ok. Keine Sorge. Alles ok.

translation.en: Nice to meet you, yeah. And you are?
translation.de: Sehr erfreut, ja. Und du bist?

translation.en: Eleven?
What's that mean?
What's it mean?
-No. -Well, I'll be damned.
She speaks.
"No"? No, what?
[clicks tongue] All right. I guess no more food, then.
Eleven.
What's it mean?
Eleven.
All right, then. [chuckles] Here you go.
Take it easy, take it easy.
Yeah, look, all I know is that she's scared to death.
Yeah, I think maybe she's been abused or... kidnapped or something.
translation.de: Ja, vielleicht wurde sie misshandelt oder entführt oder so was.

translation.en: Yeah, it'd be great if someone would come by.
translation.de: Ja, es wäre toll, wenn jemand vorbeikommen könnte.

translation.en: Yeah, we're at 4819 Randolph Lane. Yeah, Randolph.
[Callahan] Will Byers?
Come on, kid!
-[Powell whistles] -Hey! I got something.
-That his bike? -Yeah, he must have crashed.
translation.de: -Ist das sein Rad? -Ja, muss gestürzt sein.

translation.en: [Callahan] You think he got hurt in the fall?
Not so hurt he couldn't walk away.
Bike like this is like a Cadillac to these kids.
translation.de: So ein Rad ist für Kinder wie ein Cadillac.

translation.en: He would've walked it home.
translation.de: Er hätte es nach Hause geschoben.

translation.en: [woman 1] ...get off work if I win.
[woman 2] Oh, Friday I'm supposed to...
[woman 3] ...but we will cover whatever the damages are to your property.
translation.de: ...aber wir kommen für den Schaden auf.

translation.en: -It's just, um... -[woman 4] That's for sure.
[Joyce] Is Lonnie there?
[woman] Lonnie isn't here right now. [Joyce] Can you please--
translation.de: -Lonnie ist gerade nicht da. -Könnten Sie bitte...

translation.en: -I told you, Lonnie's not here. -Who is this?
translation.de: -Ich sagte, Lonnie ist nicht da. -Wer ist da?

translation.en: -His girlfriend, Cynthia. -Cynthia.
-Who the hell is this? -Cynthia, this is Joyce.
translation.de: -Wer zum Teufel sind Sie? -Cynthia, hier ist Joyce.

translation.en: -Who? -Lonnie's ex-wife.
-I really need to speak to him-- -Lonnie's not here.
translation.de: -Ich muss ihn sprechen... -Er ist nicht da.

translation.en: -Can you please put-- No! -Why don't you call back later?
No, not later. Now! -Can-- -[line disconnects]
-Bitch! -[Jonathan] Mom.
-What? -You have to stay calm.
[Lonnie] Hey, you've reached Lonnie.
Leave a message and I'll holler right back at ya.
translation.de: Sprechen Sie aufs Band und ich rufe zurück.

translation.en: Lonnie, some teenager just hung up on me.
translation.de: Lonnie, irgendeine Teenagerin hat eben einfach aufgelegt.

translation.en: Will is... is missing. I don't know where he is.
translation.de: Will ist verschwunden. Ich weiß nicht, wo er ist.

translation.en: [voice breaking] I need...
I just need you to call me back, please, just--
-Damn it! Damn it! -[car approaching]
-[sighs deeply] -Mom? What?
Cops.
-It was just lying there? -Yeah. Cal?
-Did it have any blood on it, or-- -No, no, no, no, no...
If you found the bike out there, why are you here?
translation.de: Wenn das Rad da draußen war, was machen Sie hier?

translation.en: -Well, he had a key to the house, right? -[Jonathan] Yeah.
So...
maybe he came home.
[stammers] You think I didn't check my own house?
translation.de: Meinst du, ich sah hier nicht nach?

translation.en: I'm not saying that.
-Has this always been here? -[Joyce] What? I don't know.
translation.de: -War das immer schon da? -Was? Keine Ahnung.

translation.en: Probably. I mean, I have two boys. Look at this place.
translation.de: Wahrscheinlich. Ich habe zwei Jungs. Sieh dich doch mal um.

translation.en: You're not sure?
Hey, what's up with this guy, huh?
Nothing, he's probably just hungry. Come on.
-[Callahan] Hey! -Jesus!
What are you, deaf? I've been calling you.
translation.de: Sind Sie taub? Ich habe Sie gerufen.

translation.en: -[exhales] -What's going on?
-Are you sure you're okay, Chief? -Listen, I want you to call Flo.
translation.de: -Ist alles ok, Chief? -Rufen Sie bitte Flo an.

translation.en: I want to get a search party together, all right?
All the volunteers she can muster. Bring flashlights, too.
translation.de: Sie soll Freiwillige zusammentrommeln. Mit Taschenlampen.

translation.en: [Callahan] Hey, you think we got a problem here?
translation.de: Hey, haben wir hier ein Problem?

translation.en: [Mike] We should be out there right now. We should be helping look for him.
translation.de: Wir sollten draußen sein und helfen, ihn zu suchen.

translation.en: We've been over this, Mike. The chief says--
translation.de: Wir besprachen das, Mike. Der Chief sagt...

translation.en: -I don't care what the chief said. -Michael!
We have to do something. Will can be in danger.
More reason to stay put.
-Mom! -End of discussion.
So... me and Barbara are gonna study at her house tonight.
translation.de: Also... ich und Barbara lernen heute Abend bei ihr zu Hause.

translation.en: -That's cool, right? -No, not cool.
What? Why not?
Why do you think? Am I speaking Chinese in this house?
translation.de: Was meinst du denn? Spreche ich eigentlich Chinesisch?

translation.en: Until we know Will is okay, no one leaves.
translation.de: Bis wir wissen, wo Will ist, verlässt keiner das Haus.

translation.en: -This is such bullshit. -Language.
So we're under house arrest?
Just because Mike's friend got lost on the way home from...
translation.de: Nur weil Mikes Freund sich verlief...

translation.en: -Wait, this is Will's fault? -Nancy, take that back.
translation.de: -Es ist also Wills Fehler? -Nancy, nimm das zurück.

translation.en: -No! -You're just pissed off 'cause you wanna hang out with Steve.
translation.de: Du bist nur sauer, weil du zu Steve willst.

translation.en: -Steve? -Who is Steve?
-Her new boyfriend. -You are such a douchebag, Mike!
translation.de: -Ihr neuer Freund. -Du bist so ein Idiot, Mike!

translation.en: -Language! -[groans]
Nancy, come back. Come back!
translation.de: Nancy, komm zurück. Komm sofort zurück!

translation.en: [sighs] It's okay. It's okay, Holly. Here, have some juice, okay?
translation.de: Alles ok, Holly. Hier, trink etwas Saft.

translation.en: You see, Michael?
-You see what happens? -[shouting] What happens when what?
I'm the only one acting normal here! I'm the only one that cares about Will!
translation.de: Ich bin der Einzige, der sich normal verhält und um Will sorgt!

translation.en: That is really unfair, son.
translation.de: Das ist sehr unfair, mein Junge.

translation.en: We care.
-Mike! -Let him go.
I hope you're enjoying your chicken, Ted.
translation.de: Hoffentlich schmeckt dir das Huhn, Ted.

translation.en: What did I do?
Hey! What'd I do?
[woman] Will, we're here for you, bud!
[Mr. Clarke] He's a good student.
-[Hopper] What? -Will. He's a good student.
Great one, actually.
I don't think we've met. Scott Clarke.
translation.de: Wir kennen uns nicht. Scott Clarke.

translation.en: Teacher, Hawkins Middle. Earth and biology.
translation.de: Lehrer an der Hawkins Mittelschule. Erdkunde und Biologie.

translation.en: [Hopper] I always had a distaste for science.
[Mr. Clarke] Well, maybe you had a bad teacher.
translation.de: Sie hatten wohl einen miesen Lehrer.

translation.en: [Hopper] Yeah, Ms. Ratliff was a piece of work.
[Mr. Clarke chuckles] Ratliff? You bet.
She's still kicking around, believe it or not.
translation.de: Sie ist noch da, ob Sie's glauben oder nicht.

translation.en: [Hopper] Oh, I believe it. Mummies never die, so they tell me.
translation.de: Ich glaube es. Mumien sollen ja nie sterben.

translation.en: Sarah, my daughter...
Galaxies, the universe, whatnot... She always understood all that stuff.
translation.de: Galaxien, das Universum, was auch immer... Sie kapierte den Kram immer.

translation.en: I always figured there was enough going on down here, I never needed to look elsewhere.
translation.de: Für mich war hier unten immer genug los, ich musste nie was anderes suchen.

translation.en: [Mr. Clarke] Your daughter, what grade is she?
translation.de: In welcher Klasse ist Ihre Tochter?

translation.en: -Maybe I'll get her in my class. -No, she, uh...
translation.de: -Sie könnte in meinen Unterricht kommen. -Nein, sie...

translation.en: She lives with her mom in the city.
translation.de: Sie lebt mit ihrer Mom in der Stadt.

translation.en: Thanks for coming out, Teach. We really appreciate it.
translation.de: Danke fürs Helfen, Herr Lehrer. Wir wissen das zu schätzen.

translation.en: -She died a few years back. -Sorry?
His kid.
Lucas, do you copy? It's Mike.
translation.de: Lucas, bist du da? Hier Mike.

translation.en: -Lucas? -Hey, it's Lucas.
I know it's you.
And say "over" when you're done talking so I know when you're done. Over.
translation.de: Sag "Ende", wenn du fertig bist, dann weiß ich Bescheid. Ende.

translation.en: I'm done. Over.
I'm worried about Will. Over.
translation.de: Ich mache mir Sorgen um Will. Ende.

translation.en: This is crazy. Over.
I was thinking...
Will could've cast Protection last night, but he didn't.
translation.de: Will hätte den Schutzzauber nehmen können, tat es nicht.

translation.en: He cast Fireball.
-Over. -What's your point? Over.
My point is... he could've played it safe, but he didn't.
translation.de: Er hätte auf Nummer sicher gehen können, tat es aber nicht.

translation.en: He put himself in danger to help the party.
translation.de: Er brachte sich fürs Team in Gefahr.

translation.en: Over.
Meet me in ten. Over and out.
translation.de: Treffen in zehn Minuten. Ende und aus.

translation.en: [whispers] What are you doing here?
I told you on the phone, I'm under house arrest now.
-I figured we'd just study here. -No. No way.
translation.de: -Wir können doch hier lernen. -Auf keinen Fall.

translation.en: Oh, come on. I can't have you failing this test.
translation.de: Komm. Du darfst nicht durch den Test fallen.

translation.en: So just... bear with me.
What'd I tell you?
You like that ice cream, huh?
Smile looks good on you.
You know, smile?
All right. You just sit tight.
Whoever it is, I'll tell 'em to go away real quick, all right?
translation.de: Wer immer das auch ist, ich schicke ihn weg, ok?

translation.en: -Hey, can I help you? -Hi, you must be Benny Hammond.
translation.de: -Ja bitte? -Hi, Sie müssen Benny Hammond sein.

translation.en: I'm afraid I am. I'm afraid we're closed for the evening, too.
translation.de: Ich fürchte schon. Wir haben geschlossen.

translation.en: -So try back tomorrow morning. -Connie Frazier. Social Services.
Ah, Social Services. My apologies. I didn't expect you so soon.
translation.de: Ach so, Verzeihung. Ich hatte Sie noch nicht erwartet.

translation.en: -That's a heck of a drive. -Not too bad this time of night.
translation.de: -Es ist eine lange Fahrt. -Um die Zeit geht es.

translation.en: Hey, listen, I... I haven't told her that you're coming yet.
translation.de: Ich hab ihr nicht erzählt, dass Sie kommen.

translation.en: I didn't want her running off again. She's a tad skittish.
translation.de: Ich wollte ihr keine Angst einjagen. Sie ist etwas scheu.

translation.en: -Children I work with usually are. -Right, right.
-So, where is she? -Right. She's in the kitchen.
translation.de: -Wo ist sie? -Ja. Sie ist in der Küche.

translation.en: -Come on up. I'll introduce you. -Thank you.
Sorry again for trying to turn you away there.
translation.de: Sorry, dass ich Sie abwimmeln wollte.

translation.en: -It's fine. -You know, it's funny.
-Your, uh, voice sounds different on the-- -[silenced gunshot]
translation.de: Ihre Stimme klang anders als die...

translation.en: [Lucas] Ah, man. This is it.
Hey, guys. You feel that?
translation.de: Hey, Leute. Habt ihr was abgekriegt?

translation.en: -I think maybe we should go back. -No.
We're not going back. Just stay close.
translation.de: Wir fahren nicht zurück. Bleib hier.

translation.en: Come on.
Just stay on channel six. Don't do anything stupid.
translation.de: Immer Kanal sechs. Und keine Dummheiten.

translation.en: Hey, guys, wait up.
Wait up!
[Steve] "Which polymers occur naturally?"
translation.de: "Welche Polymere kommen in der Natur vor?"

translation.en: Starch and cellulose.
"In a molecule of CH4, the hydrogen atoms are spatially oriented
translation.de: "In einem CH4-Molekül befinden sich die Wasserstoffatome

translation.en: -towards the centers of--" -Tetrahedrons.
Wow. Jesus, how many of these did you make?
translation.de: Wow. Mein Gott, wie viele davon hast du gemacht?

translation.en: You said you wanted to help.
How about this? How about...
How about every time that you get something right, I have to take off an item of clothing.
translation.de: Immer wenn du richtig antwortest, muss ich etwas ausziehen.

translation.en: But every time that you get something wrong--
-Uh, pass. -Oh, come on.
-Come on. -No.
-Come on. It'll be fun. -No.
"During fractional distillation, hydrocarbons are separated according to their--"
translation.de: "Bei der fraktionierten Destillation trennen sich Kohlenwasserstoffe gemäß..."

translation.en: Melting point.
Ooh, it's boiling points.
That's what I meant.
Yeah, that's not what you said.
-No. -No?
Oh, do you need... Do you need help, or...
translation.de: Brauchst du... Brauchst du Hilfe oder...

translation.en: [whispers] Steve. Steve, come on.
What?
Are you crazy? My parents are here.
translation.de: Bist du wahnsinnig? Meine Eltern sind hier.

translation.en: That's weird, I... don't see them.
Was this your plan all along? To... to get in my room and then...
translation.de: War das die ganze Zeit dein Plan? In mein Zimmer kommen und dann...

translation.en: -get another notch on your belt. -No. Nancy, no.
I'm not Laurie, or Amy, or Becky.
translation.de: Ich bin weder Laurie noch Amy oder Becky.

translation.en: You mean, you're not a slut.
translation.de: Du meinst, du bist keine Schlampe.

translation.en: That's not what I'm saying.
You know, you're so cute when you lie.
translation.de: Du bist so süß, wenn du lügst.

translation.en: Shut up.
Bad Steve.
[groans] Bad. Don't do that to Miss Nancy...
translation.de: Böse. Tu das Miss Nancy nicht an...

translation.en: You're an idiot, Steve Harrington.
translation.de: Du bist ein Idiot, Steve Harrington.

translation.en: You are beautiful, Nancy Wheeler.
"Compared to the rate of inorganic reactions,
the rate of organic reactions is generally..."
translation.de: ist die Anzahl organischer Reaktionen generell..."

translation.en: [Joyce] Jonathan, wow. You took these?
translation.de: Jonathan, wow. Die hast du gemacht?

translation.en: These are great.
[sniffling] Wow, they really are.
I know I haven't been there for you. [stammers] I've been...
translation.de: Ich weiß, ich war zu wenig für euch da. Ich habe...

translation.en: working so hard and I...
I just feel bad. I don't even...
barely know what's going on with you. [chuckles]
All right? I am sorry about that.
Hey, what is it? What is it, honey?
translation.de: Hey, was ist? Was ist los, Schatz?

translation.en: -Nothing. [sniffles] -Tell me. Tell me.
-Come on. You can... -No.
It's just...
[voice breaking] I should've been there for him.
translation.de: Ich hätte für ihn da sein müssen.

translation.en: [hoarsely] No. Oh, no. You can't do that to yourself.
translation.de: Nein. Tu dir das nicht an.

translation.en: This was not your fault. Do you hear me?
translation.de: Es war nicht deine Schuld. Hast du verstanden?

translation.en: He is... close. I know it. [stammers] I...
translation.de: Er ist... ganz nah. Ich weiß es. Ich...

translation.en: I feel it in my heart. [sniffles]
translation.de: Ich spüre es in meinem Herzen.

translation.en: You just have to... You have to trust me on this, okay?
translation.de: Du musst mir... Du musst mir vertrauen, ok?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Oh, look at this.
Look at this one. Look at this one.
translation.de: Sieh dir nur das an. Sieh es dir an.

translation.en: -I mean, that's it, right? -Yeah.
[hoarsely] That's it. That's the one.
translation.de: Das ist es. Das ist perfekt.

translation.en: -[muffled breathing on phone] -Who is this?
-[sobs] -Mom, it's Will?
-[yelling] Who is this? -[indistinct growling]
-[yelling] What have you done to my boy? -What? What?
Give me back my son!
translation.de: Geben Sie mir meinen Sohn zurück!

translation.en: -[groans] -Hello? Hello, who is this?
-Mom, who was it? Who was it, Mom? -[muttering incoherently]
translation.de: Mom, wer war das? Wer war das, Mom?

translation.en: -[sobbing] It was him. -Look at me, Mom. Was it Will?
-Yes. -What did he say?
[sobbing] He just breathed. He just breathed.
-[Jonathan] And was someone else there? -I...
-Mom, who was there? Who was it? -It was him.
translation.de: -Mom, wer war da? Wer war es? -Er war es.

translation.en: I know it was his breathing. I know it was his breathing.
translation.de: Ich weiß, es war sein Atmen. Es war sein Atmen.

translation.en: [Dustin] I've got your X-Men 134!
Guys, I really think we should turn back.
translation.de: Leute, ich finde, wir sollten umkehren.

translation.en: [Lucas] Seriously, Dustin?
You wanna be a baby, then go home already!
translation.de: Wenn du ein Baby sein willst, geh heim!

translation.en: I'm just being realistic, Lucas!
No, you're just being a big sissy!
translation.de: Nein, du bist ein großes Weichei!

translation.en: [Dustin] Did you ever think Will went missing because he ran into something bad?
translation.de: Und wenn Will verschwand, weil er auf etwas Böses gestoßen ist?

translation.en: And we're going to the exact same spot where he was last seen?
translation.de: Und wir gehen an den Ort, wo man ihn zuletzt sah,

translation.en: -And we have no weapons or anything? -Dustin, shut up.
translation.de: -Ohne Waffen oder sonst was? -Dustin, halt die Klappe.

translation.en: I'm just saying, does that seem smart to you?
translation.de: Ich meine ja nur. Findet ihr das schlau?

translation.en: -Shut up. Shut up. -[rustling]
Did you guys hear that?
